casebody.data:
Odina WESLEY and Norris Wesley, co-Administrators of the Estate of Hasani N'Namdi Wesley, deceased
v.
WINSTON-SALEM/FORSYTH COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION and Billy Roger Bailey No. 202P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Allen C. Smith, Attorney at Law, M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Winston-Salem/Forsyth County Board of Education. Austin R. Walsh, Attorney at Law, Charlotte. David B. Hough, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Julie C. Boyer, Attorney at Law, for Wesley, Odina, et al. Rodney A. Guthrie, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Bailey, Billy Roger.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th of May 2016 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
